sentence: Hello Everyone, I am Anita, I Come from Mumbai.
I have just joined the organization as Customer Support Associate.
I have completed my graduation in Business Management Studies.
I completed a 3 month Internship program in Society General.
My father is self employed and my mother is a housewife.
I have a younger sister who is still studying.
I am the only Deaf in my family.
I like to watch Hindi movies as there is a lot of drama in them
This is my first job and I am very excited to work with new team.
